values.name: Zero Quartile
values.desc: An Expense Management application. It's a way to identify the expense drivers through the expense profile and ultimately identify the cost savings.

values.name: IOT
values.desc: An Asset Management application. It tracks and manages asset and various behaviour of the asset.

values.name: AMP
values.desc: Automated Machine Learning Platform (AMP) - helps organizations build AI applications that learn business, make timely recommendations to improve KPI's.

values.name: Supply Chain Forensics
values.desc: Tool that allows you to manage all components and finished goods part numbers.

values.name: Asset Health Monitor
values.desc: The application provides instant insight to issues that need immediate attention for all components in the solar panel ecosystem.

values.name: Solar Operations Watch
values.desc: Developed an analytical product for the 'Internet of Things' infrastructure which aids the end user ensure the system will not run out of energy.
